schema.description: Population percentiles for vital signs stratified by age and sex

artifacts.transformations: Extracted from examination files, computed percentiles per demographic stratum
artifacts.intended_use: Provide population context for resting HR, BP, BMI, waist circumference

schema.description: Reference intervals and critical thresholds for common lab analytes

artifacts.transformations: Extracted from laboratory data files, computed 2.5-97.5 percentiles as reference intervals
artifacts.intended_use: Validate uploaded lab values, provide fallback reference ranges when lab doesn't provide them

artifacts.source_url: Multiple sources: ADA guidelines, AHA/ACC, ESC, ACSM

schema.structure: Nested JSON with gating thresholds, confidence parameters, time windows
schema.description: Calibration constants for confidence stabilization and quality gating

artifacts.intended_use: Configure gating engine and confidence engine with safe defaults
